link_mentions.page: List of recipients of the Order of Industrial Heroism
response: | 144 ||  || Seaman || Speke ||  ||  ||  || Dived fully clothed into Stalbridge Dock, to rescue a colleague. Also commended for a second rescue. Award presented by the Lord Mayor of Liverpool, Alderman Sir Sydney Jones.
